data.Title: Google Search Updates
data.Description: Google has been busy with several updates to its search engine, including testing auto-playing video thumbnails in search results, confirming that ads can show up below organic featured snippets, and making more use of the right sidebar on desktop and overlays on mobile.

data.Title: Bing Tests Voting on Search Results
data.Description: Bing is testing a new feature that allows users to vote on search results, with the percentage of up vs. down votes displayed.

data.Title: Google Search Console Enhancements
data.Description: Google Search Console has introduced new settings for businesses to provide shipping and return policy information.

data.Title: Google My Business Removes Thumbtack Links
data.Description: Google My Business is removing Thumbtack booking and appointment links from business profiles.

data.Title: OpenAI Developments
data.Description: OpenAI is reportedly developing a search product and working on a project code-named "Strawberry" to enhance AI model reasoning capabilities.

data.Title: COPIED Act Targets AI Content Use
data.Description: The COPIED Act, a new Senate bill, seeks to protect artists and journalists' content from unauthorized AI use by giving content owners more control over how their work is used.

data.Title: Majestic Discontinues Disavow Links Feature
data.Description: Majestic will no longer offer its disavow links feature, stating that it was never encouraged and is not an effective method for identifying toxic links.
